name: WoowUp
headline: Woowup App help companies to boost the growth of their business by creating valuable relationships with their customers.
overview: This app allow you to connect your Vtex Store with your Woowup Marketing CRM Account.
features: Easily connect your VTEX data with Woowup personalize your communications
additionalinformation: a Woowup Account is required in order to connect with Vtex
